profile:
Adanac is dedicated to providing its customers with quality roofing and aluminum gutter services backed by strong workmanship and material warranties! Adanac’s roofing capabilities encompass virtually all forms of steep-slope and flat roofing.

We strive to offer our customers the highest level of customer service in an effort to maintain a strong referral base. In doing this, we have succeeded in becoming one of the lower mainland's premier roofing companies.

 Adanac Roofing Supply and Install IKO, CertainTeed and Malarkey asphalt shingles. Synthetic product we supply and Install Davinci,Enviroshake and all types of metal roofs along with Cedar shakes.

profile: Penfolds Roofing & Solar has been serving the Greater Vancouver area and Fraser Valley since 1937, earning a reputation for honesty & quality craftsmanship with a wide range of superior re roofing shingles and roof shakes, such as the indestructible EcoRoof rubber shakes, including the latest technology in Solar PV. We service all types of roofs and customers, including Residential Re Roofing, Strata & Multi-Family properties, Commercial/Industrial, New Construction and we have a full service Service/Repairs department.  We also provide renewable technologies as in Solar Photovoltaics (Solar Panels) while roofing, or by itself.  We are a full service operation that warrantees and guarantees everything we do!
service_area: At Penfolds Roofing we have over 150 employees. We professionally service all roofing projects throughout the Lower Mainland, including Whistler/Squamish and out to Chilliwack

profile:
Ridge Meadows Roofing was founded in September 2001 by Trevor McDonald, who has more than 25 years of roofing experience. We specialize in residential asphalt shingle re-roofing and are certified CertainTeed ShingleMasters. Trevor is the son of Brian and Dorothy McDonald, who  successfully owned and operated McDonald’s Flooring in Maple Ridge for over 40 years. After taking several business and marketing classes in college, and then learning the trade over six years, Trevor decided to operate his own roofing company. Beginning as a modest residential re-roofing and repairing business, Ridge Meadows Roofing has grown into a full-fledged team of skilled professionals, who consistently provide great service and demonstrate their workmanship on each and every roof. But even with a talented team of roofing professionals, Trevor carefully oversees all tasks.
 
We service the following areas and beyond; Maple Ridge, Pitt Meadows, Port Coquitlam, Coquitlam, Port Moody, Langley, Surrey, Burnaby and Vancouver.
 
Book a FREE no-obligation written quote today!

profile: Jooya Roofing has over 15 years of residential roofing and re-roofing experience. We offer free written estimates with prices that beat other competitive companies. Not only is quality guaranteed in materials and installation, but we hire fully trained employees with WCB COVERAGE. Whenever you need us we are there with 24 HOUR EMERGENCY SERVICE. We Specialize in: New roof, Re-roof, Cedar shake conversion to fiberglass Asphalt shingles, Duroid shingles to fiberglass asphalt shingles and Torch-on roofs, Re-Roof New roof Cedar conversion to asphalt shingles.. Gutter cleaning power washing. Contact us today to book your appointment.
